name: Bendy:RPG
description: This is an RPG Maker  recreation of the first chapter of bendy and the ink machine by Kindly Beast. I worked within the RPG Maker 2003 engine to create the first chapter as well as I could and im pretty sure i have everything. There is a full credits in the game but this definitely wouldn’t have been possible without my friend drew so definitely feel free to check them out @portalpilled most places.
